alert.note: Alert for Jackson (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 23 at 2:38AM CST until February 23 at 9:00AM CST by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM CST THIS MORNING... ...ICE STORM WARNING IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...Freezing rain. Additional ice accumulations of a light glaze. * WHERE...In Iowa, Jackson County. In Illinois, Jo Daviess and Stephenson Counties. * WHEN...Until 9 AM CST this morning. * IMPACTS...Very slippery sidewalks, roads and bridges are possible. The hazardous conditions could impact the Thursday morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Very slick road conditions are expected in spots due to lingering effects from yesterday`s ice storm. This will impact travel for the Thursday morning commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Prepare for possible power outages. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
